title: [Large-scale] Integrated Medical and Humanities Education: Instructional Design Based on Cognitive Apprenticeship Model

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic medical terminology and humanities-based critical thinking skills
context.additional_context: An integrated competency enhancement program for current professionals (medical/language fields). Structuring online-offline collaborative learning environments using digital devices.

learning_goals: Develop three or more patient-centered communication strategies by analyzing integrated medicine-humanities case studies
Solve practical problems by applying the six stages of the cognitive apprenticeship model (modeling, coaching, scaffolding, etc.)
Create two or more medical scenarios reflecting humanities-based insights through project-based assessment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
